data.name: Outrageous Grounds: The Maze Demo
data.detailed_description:
Outrageous Grounds: The Maze is a new virtual reality FPS adventure set in the depths of The Maze.
This demo is to show off our locomotion. We use an arm swing movement system, which gives you the ability to move freely and comfortably in VR with great precision.

This demo is a small part of our upcoming Early Access release on January 26th.

Enjoy!

IMPORTANT: If you are playing with Oculus Touch, select 'oculusdemo' build from the beta builds in the game properties. Also be careful with your movements if you don't have an extension cord for your Oculus HMD.

data.short_description: Outrageous Grounds: The Maze is a stunning new virtual reality FPS adventure set in the depths of The Maze.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD R9 390
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
